title: Top 10: Brands Embracing the Circular Economy - Sustainability Magazine

title: How can farmers deliver on EU Green Deal environmental commitments? | - Open Access Government
summary: The EU Green Deal aims to transform the agricultural sector towards sustainability by promoting eco-friendly practices, incentivizing farmers to adopt innovative technologies, and providing financial support for their transition. Farmers are encouraged to implement sustainable farming methods, such as agroforestry, crop rotation, and organic production, to reduce their environmental footprint and contribute to climate change mitigation. The deal also promotes resource efficiency, waste reduction, and pollution control measures, while highlighting the importance of carbon sequestration and renewable energy production within the agricultural sector.
